article.title: Lockheed Martin to Provide Periscope Detection Radar
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems & Training, Owego, N.Y., is being awarded a $98,399,462 firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the manufacture and delivery of up to 50 AN/APS-153(V)1 automatic radar periscope detect and discrimination multi-mode radar kits to upgrade the MH-60R fleet aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity (N00019-13-D-4000).
